title: Did Canada Approve Psychedelic Mushrooms for Depression and Anxiety Treatment?
subtitle: Research indicates that the hallucinogenic chemical in mushrooms may treat certain health issues.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In November 2020, the Canadian government approved the use of psilocybin therapy, which uses the hallucinogenic chemical compound found in psychedelic mushrooms, to ease anxiety and depression associated with a terminal diagnosis.
